doc.title: September 11 Memories: Robert Cirri
doc.abstract: Lt. Robert Dominick Cirri, aged 39, of [New Jersey|Nutley, New Jersey] was a police officer for the Port Authority of New York and New Jersey.

doc.title: September 11 Memories: Erik Locarno
doc.abstract: Eric Locarno was 13 when he died September 11, 2001. Although no one knows why he was walking near the WTC, he was asphyxiated from the dust and debris.

doc.title: September 11 Memories: John McAvoy
doc.abstract: John Kevin McAvoy was a FDNY firefighter from Staten Island, New York. He died aged 47.

doc.title: September 11 Memories: Tara Creamer
doc.abstract: Tara Creamer died age 30 in crash of American Airlines Flight 11 during [11, 2001 attacks|September 11, 2001 terrorist attacks]. She was survived by her husband John Creamer and two children, Colin and Nora, who were 4 and 1, respectively, at the time of her death.

doc.title: September 11 Memories: Christine Hanson
doc.abstract: Christine Lee Hanson, born February 22, 1999, was the daughter of Peter and Sue Hanson of [Massachusetts|Groton, Massachusetts]. At age two, Christine became the youngest victim of the September 11, 2001 terrorist attacks.

doc.abstract: Steven D. "Jake" Jacoby was an American business executive.

doc.abstract: Berry Berenson (Berinthia B. Perkins) (1948 - September 11, 2001) was a model, actress and photographer.

doc.title: September 11 Memories: Michael Asher
doc.abstract: Michael Edward Asher was a victim of the September 11, 2001 terrorist attacks. He was an employee of Cantor Fitzgerald Securities and was killed in the attack on the World Trade Center at the age of 53.

doc.abstract: Stephen Vernon Long was a major who died in the Pentagon attack, aged 39.

doc.title: September 11 Memories: Stephen Huczko
doc.abstract: Steve Huczko was found in the lobby of the North Tower with four other Port Authority members and one civilian. They were trying to rescue the woman when the tower collapsed.

doc.abstract: Stephen Emanual Poulos was an [singer and IT officer. He lived in Basking Ridge, New Jersey], and worked for [[Aon Corporation.

doc.abstract: Shawn Edward Bowman, Jr. was a computer specialist and active [Scout|Eagle Scout].

doc.title: September 11 Memories: Aon Corporation
doc.abstract: Aon Corporation is a company that was located in the [Trade Center|World Trade Center] at the time of the attack.

doc.title: September 11 Memories: Cantor Fitzgerald Securities
doc.abstract: Cantor Fitzgerald lost 685 employees in the attack on the World Trade Center, considerably more than any other employer.

doc.title: September 11 Memories: Sandler O'Neill and Partners
doc.abstract: Sandler O'Neill and Partners was located on the 104th floor of Two World Trade Center. It lost 66 of its 180 employees in the September 11, 2001 terrorist attack.

doc.title: September 11 Memories: Keefe, Bruyette and Woods, Inc.
doc.abstract: One of the offices of Keefe, Bruyette and Woods, Inc was located on the 89th along with the 85th & 88th floors of the World Trade Center's south tower at the time of the September 11, 2001 terrorist attacks.

doc.title: September 11 Memories: Ruth McCourt
doc.abstract: Ruth Clifford McCourt was a resident of New London, Connecticut.

doc.title: September 11 Memories: Ruben Ornedo
doc.abstract: Ruben Ornedo was an American computer engineer. He died at age 39 in the crash of American Airlines flight 77 during the September 11, 2001 terrorist attacks.

doc.title: September 11 Memories: Ronald Gamboa
doc.abstract: Ronald Gamboa was an American retail manager. He was a manager at The Gap store in [Monica, California|Santa Monica, California].

doc.title: September 11 Memories: Daniel Brandhorst
doc.abstract: Daniel Brandhorst was a lawyer and accountant. He worked in the Los Angeles office of the accounting firm Pricewaterhouse Coopers.

doc.title: September 11 Memories: David Brandhorst
doc.abstract: David Reed Gamboa Brandhorst was the adopted son of Daniel Brandhorst and Ronald Gamboa, a same-sex couple who had been together for 14 years.

doc.abstract: Celeste Victoria died September 11, 2001 in the World Trade Center.

doc.abstract: Melissa Harrington-Hughes, 31, was on the 101st floor of the North Tower of the [Trade Center|World Trade Center]. She worked for a software company out of California and was at the WTC meeting executives of management consultancy company Accenture.

doc.title: September 11 Memories: Juanita Freje
doc.abstract: Juanita Del Freje was supposedly killed in the September 11, 2001 terrorist attack on the World Trade Center. Her name does not appear on the official rolls as a casualty; the information below is most likely apocryphal, though she may have been listed under another name.

doc.abstract: Donald LaRoy Adams was killed at age 28 in the [11, 2001 attacks|September 11, 2001 terrorist attack] on the World Trade Center. Adams, a resident of Chatham, New Jersey, worked for Cantor Fitzgerald Securities.
